title: Damnation Alley
description: Contains an additional 24 pages of still photos from the movie. Survival run...across a nuclear wasteland, where rampaging winds sweep the ruins of civilization over the charred plains & shattered mountains of America. Where huge bats battle gigantic butterflies in the contaminated rubble of barren cities & where armies of madmen crucify scientists along the deserted highways.Damnation Alley. Where a handful of survivors pilot their awesome, fire-breating machine on a coast-to-coast trek thru a world gone to hell.
author: Roger Zelazny
